LanguageData.WTH_ExtractBrainData.label: extract brain data
LanguageData.WTH_ExtractBrainData.description: Extract all the data from a human brain using mechanoid technology. As you might expect from mechanoid technology, the operation doesn't really take into account the well-being of the patient. In other words, this technique cannot be applied without destroying the brain of the patient. More intelligent pawns will yield more data.
LanguageData.WTH_Scrap_AdvancedMechanoidChip.label: scrap advanced mechanoid chip

LanguageData.WTH_Craft_VanometricModule.label: craft vanometric module
LanguageData.WTH_Craft_VanometricModule.description: Craft a vanometric power cell module
LanguageData.WTH_Craft_SelfDestructModule.label: craft self-destruct module
LanguageData.WTH_Craft_TurretModule.label: craft turret module
LanguageData.WTH_Craft_RepairModule.label: craft repair module
LanguageData.WTH_Craft_RepairArm.label: craft repair arm
LanguageData.WTH_Craft_BeltModule.label: craft belt module
LanguageData.WTH_HackMechanoid.label: hack mechanoid targeting device
LanguageData.WTH_HackMechanoid.description: Hacks the targeting device of a mechanoid so it targets your enemies instead of yourself
LanguageData.WTH_InduceEmergencySignal.label: try inducing an emergency signal
LanguageData.WTH_InduceEmergencySignal.description: The colonist will deliberately try to trigger a self-defence mechanism in the mechanoid that transmits an emergency signal to nearby mechanoids when activated, attracting them. This is a good way of getting some extra mechanoid parts, but also a good way to get your base blown up. The operation is remarkably difficult, and even if it is performed successfully, the mechanoid will be damaged beyond repair.
LanguageData.WTH_ImplantAI.label: implant AI
LanguageData.WTH_ImplantAI.description: Implants the AI persona core into the mechanoid, allowing full control for combat purposes
LanguageData.WTH_InstallOverdriveModule.label: install overdrive module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallSpeedModule.label: install speed module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallCargoModule.label: install cargo module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallOpticSensorModule.label: install optic sensor module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallArmorModule.label: install armor module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallGrowingModule.label: install growing module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallFirefightingModule.label: install firefighting module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallCleaningModule.label: install cleaning module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallHaulingModule.label: install hauling module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallRepairArm.label: install repair arm
LanguageData.WTH_InstallTurretModule.label: install turret module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallTurretModule.description: A module that provides both structural support and and interface for gun turrets and mortars. Any turret that can be uninstalled, can be interfaced with this module. While this is a powerful upgrade, turrets do draw extra power, and have a tendency of exploding when destroyed. Can only be installed on large mechanoids.
LanguageData.WTH_InstallRepairModule.label: install repair module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallRepairModule.description: A module that can be loaded with mechanoid parts, and is capable of redirecting the mechanoid's power supply to its internal mechanites. This activates the mechanites, which will repair the mechanoid using the parts, but renders the mechanoid incapable of doing anything during the process.
LanguageData.WTH_InstallSelfDestruct.label: install self destruct option
LanguageData.WTH_InstallSelfDestruct.description: Adds the ability to let the mechanoid self destruct by short-circuiting installed high explosive mortar shells. A plasteel casing prevents that the explosives go off unintentionally.
LanguageData.WTH_InstallBeltModule.label: install belt module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallBeltModule.description: Install a module that allows mechanoids to equip belts like shield belts and smokepop belts.
LanguageData.WTH_InstallBatteryExpansionModule.label: install battery expansion module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallBatteryExpansionModule.descri: Gives the mechanoid extra battery capacity at the cost of a small movement penalty.
LanguageData.WTH_InstallVanometricModule.label: install vanometric power cell module
LanguageData.WTH_InstallVanometricModule.description: Gives the mechanoid infinite power supply at the cost of a small movement penalty.
LanguageData.WTH_ShutDownMechanoid.label: shut down
